name: Abraham Afewerki
description: '''Abraham Afewerki''', ({{langx|ti|ኣብርሃም ኣፈወርቂ}})  (30 January 1966 – 7 October 2006) was an Eritrean singer, songwriter, and music producer. Noted for his unique [[Tigrinya language|Tigrinya]]-based compositions and lyrics, he was one of the most recognized figures among Eritrean musicians and celebrities and also the world.
